Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students who are trying to talk to each other over a long distance.
The student can represent a string telephone as the device connecting the two students.
The student can show how sound travels along the string to help the students communicate.
The student can ensure that the drawing shows the string is tight and goes directly from one student's cup to the other student's cup.
The student can illustrate how the device uses sound, not light, to send and receive information.
The student can show why the device is needed for communication over a distance.
